Mod.Name: [Tsunamods] Card-RF
Mod.Author: Ducladoncladon & Hobbitdur
Mod.Description: Card-RF is a graphical update to the beloved Triple Triad minigame! Which can now be played in full 60 FPS thanks to FFNx! Using original reference artworks from Final Fantasy 8 and higher, and a combination of AI upscaling and many hours of manual touch ups and corrections, we have brought this amazing minigame to a more modern appearance

LatestVersion.ReleaseNotes: Release note: - 1.2: Fixed Card Menu Textures not working - 1.3: Adding language option
